basics.name: Juan Muñoz Villalón
basics.label: Telecommunications and Machine Learning Student
basics.summary: Student in a Double Master's program in Telecommunications Engineering and Machine Learning for Healthcare, with strong technical knowledge in AI applications in scientific fields such as healthcare and telecommunications.

work.name: Infineon Technologies AG
work.summary: Worked as part of the team developing secure sensors for blockchain technology.
highlights: Implemented secure sensor applications in PSoC 64.
Developed a JavaScript server in Docker for authentication verification.
Co-authored a paper on blockchain oracle design using Trusted Firmware-M.

work.name: University Carlos III of Madrid - EPIQ Chair with Arquimea
work.summary: Setting up a probe station to characterize Photonic Integrated Circuits (PICs) dedicated to functional Near-Infrared Spectroscopy (fNIRS) using Dual-Comb technology.
highlights: Assembly and configuration of probe station for PICs characterization.
Applying Dual-Comb technology to enhance PICs functionality for fNIRS applications.

education.area: Telecommunications Engineering and Machine Learning for Healthcare
Semiconductor Laser Theory and RF Integrated Circuits

projects.name: Signal Processing and Modulation Techniques
projects.summary: Analyzed various modulation and coding methods for telecommunications applications.

projects.name: Embedded Systems Development
projects.summary: Implemented elevator control in C for microcontrollers and developed games in VHDL/Verilog on FPGA.

projects.name: Semiconductor Laser Design
projects.summary: Designed Fabry-Perot cavities for a 1310 nm semiconductor laser.

projects.name: Client-Server Application
projects.summary: Created a Python client-server application with a GUI, providing outputs based on user data.

projects.name: Electronics Circuit Simulations
projects.summary: Simulated electronic circuits in LTspice and Qucs for performance analysis.

hobbies: Reading about cosmology, physics, history, and fantasy literature
